titles.title: It's Covered, Covered, Covered By The Blood Of The Lamb

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Moses left old Pharaoh down in Egypt land,
The Israelites delivered by God's almighty hand.
They came up to the Red Sea and saw the way was blocked.
The Israelites were running round in shock
Chorus:
It's covered, covered, covered by the Blood of the Lamb.
Covered, covered, covered by the Blood of the Lamb.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Moses cried out to the Lord, Lord what shall we do?
Jehovah answered Moses, Man what's wrong with you?
See that rod that's in your hand? Lift it up on high.
Red Seas gonna open up, and Pharaoh's gonna die.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Now David and Goliath were champions of old,
Of Israelites and Philistines, the way the story's told.
Goliath thought he had it made 'cause David was so small
And he himself was over ten feet tall.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Goliath said to David, You're nothing but a boy
Come up to me and you will see I'll break you like a toy
David said, I'll bury you beneath six feet of sod
For you come to me with sword and shield
But I come in the name of my God.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Now, Jesus went to Calvary, it seemed that all was lost.
Satan and his evil crew had nailed Him to the Cross.
He looked up to the heavens and he said, Thy will be done.
And ever since that day, for us the victory has been won.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
And now the Babylonish Church, she says I have to die.
She tells me that my only hope is far beyond the sky.
That sickness is my portion and the rapture is my hope.
She expects me to believe that stuff as if I were a dope.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
For Romans eight has set me straight and filled my heart with glee,
For the law of the Spirit of life, from sin and death has set me free.
And now we sing, I shall be changed! and all the heavens ring.
O grave where is thy victory! O death where is thy sting!

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Cubierto, cubierto, cubierto por la sangre de Jesus.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
David de los Israelitas y Goliat de los Filisteos,
Cada uno fue campeon, asi lo entendemos.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Goliat penso: Lo matare en un ya,
Facilito eso sera, el israelita pequeno se ve,
Y con mis dies metros ni batalla habra.

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Goliat diho a David: Un ninito eres tu para mi.
Te hago pedasos como un huguete
Si es que tu subes aqui.

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
David le dijo: Abajo y muerto, alli te tocara estar.
Pues to vienes con lanza y espada
Mas yo en el nombre de Jehova.

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: Moises estaba con ese Faraon en Egipto y alli lo dejo

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: La mano poderosa del Senor a los Israelitas lo liberto.

verse.name: v15
verse.lines:
Llegaron al mar rojo y el camino se cerro alli
Muertos de miedo, confusos y atonitos

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: Y casi se desmayan alli.

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: Moises clamo al Senor: Dios mio que acemos aqui?

verse.name: v18
verse.lines:
Jehova contesto a Moises: Porque estas asi?
No ves la vara en tu mano?, levantala arriba ya

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: Y veras que el mar se abre y faraon si morira.

verse.name: v20
verse.lines:
El caso paresido perdido cuando Jesus al Calverio llego
Satanas con su ejercito a una cruz le clavo

verse.name: v21
verse.lines:
Sea hecha tu voluntad, dijo Jesus, y a los cielos el miro
Desde entonces podemos vencer

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: Porque la victoria el gano.

verse.name: v23
verse.lines:
La iglesia babilonia dice: Seguro que moriras
Que mi unica esperanza esta enlos cielos, mas alla

verse.name: v24
verse.lines: Que la enfermedad es mi porcion y que y que a los cielos ire yo

verse.name: v25
verse.lines: Y espera que yo coma ese cuento como si un tonto fuera

verse.name: v26
verse.lines:
Yo Romanos 8 me ha enderezado y mi corazon
Esta alegre en mi y ahora el Espirito de vida me ha

verse.name: v27
verse.lines: Liberado de la muerte, si.

verse.name: v28
verse.lines:
Y ahora cantamos: Seremos transformados.
Y en los cielos estan cantando ya:

verse.name: v29
verse.lines: Donde esta, oh muerte, tu aguijon?
